title: hack3rcon
author: hack3rcon
content: Hello,Which one of these robots is better than the others?https://www.unite.ai/best-ai-crypto-trading-bots/Please share your experiences.Thank you so much.

comments.author: entebah
comments.body: i read the article but from the 10 that you listed there, I just know 1 bot which is the Gun Bot, and that bot has been around since 2016.because I believe that bot is created by one of bitcointalk members and you can read the official thread here [GUNBOT] Trading Bot with 136 exchanges available!!

comments.author: hack3rcon
comments.body: Quote from: entebah on May 06, 2023, 06:42:00 AMi read the article but from the 10 that you listed there, I just know 1 bot which is the Gun Bot, and that bot has been around since 2016.because I believe that bot is created by one of bitcointalk members and you can read the official thread here [GUNBOT] Trading Bot with 136 exchanges available!!Hello,Thank you so much for your reply.Did you test it?

comments.author: ImThour
comments.body: None of them is the **best**. No AI can predict what the market move will be next. Can the AI tell if $PEPE was going to make 3000x gains in a week? Nope.Literally, no one can predict any market, you can speculate on the basis of previous moves when the indicators reached a particular point.When RSI is below 20, most of the time traders consider it as an oversold condition and buy the asset. When multiple traders think alike, the price starts going up.Do not rely on any AI trading bot to make money for you.

comments.author: hack3rcon
comments.body: Quote from: ImThour on May 06, 2023, 08:03:11 AMNone of them is the **best**. No AI can predict what the market move will be next. Can the AI tell if $PEPE was going to make 3000x gains in a week? Nope.Literally, no one can predict any market, you can speculate on the basis of previous moves when the indicators reached a particular point.When RSI is below 20, most of the time traders consider it as an oversold condition and buy the asset. When multiple traders think alike, the price starts going up.Do not rely on any AI trading bot to make money for you.Thanks.You right, but I just want a bot to do the buying and selling for me. For example, sell Ethereum when became $10 more expensive than the current price and buy it when becomes $10 cheaper than the current price.

comments.author: entebah
comments.body: Quote from: hack3rcon on May 06, 2023, 07:58:55 AMQuote from: entebah on May 06, 2023, 06:42:00 AMi read the article but from the 10 that you listed there, I just know 1 bot which is the Gun Bot, and that bot has been around since 2016.because I believe that bot is created by one of bitcointalk members and you can read the official thread here [GUNBOT] Trading Bot with 136 exchanges available!!Hello,Thank you so much for your reply.Did you test it?I did test the bot using the trial access for 3 days and the bot is pretty easy to set up even using it even the bot support seems responding very fast.but sadly I don't buy it yet because the bot price is quite expensive for me which is around 0.04BTC for the ultimate version

comments.author: Etranger
comments.body: I tried to test Mizar, however I found myself more stressed and concerned about how the bot is working compared to how I trade on my own. I can’t say yet that I have confidence in AI trading bots. From my experience, I continue to conclude that for the time being, a person is coping with this task more effectively, since a human being does not analyse dry numbers and patterns on the chart, but also takes into account the fundamental indicators that affect the visual component.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Personally, I wouldn't rely on any automated trading tool to perform trades instead of me. Even if it does 50 good trades, there is always the chance something horrible can happen at the 51st trade. You might say, the same thing can happen if you make those trades yourself. True, but at least that's my mistake and proof I shouldn't be trading if I don't know what I am doing. There is too much focus on trading here by people who have no skills to do it at all. Buy the coin you want and hold it. If it reaches a prize point you are happy with, sell it.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: @OP, Do you want to start using bots to carry out your trade? Well, unfortunately, I cannot make a choice for you because I don't rely on AI decisions for certain things, like trading, gambling, and comments decisions. Just as Sir Pmalek has said, even if the bot makes 50 successful trades, there are still zero chances that the 51 trades will be successful because bots are not so certain about the crypto market andv price regulation, just as humans are not very certain either. I will prefer to do my normal trades myself, even if I am just making a little profit. I must not make a handful of profits before realizing it; a gradual and steady profit for me means I don't need the bot. Let's say, for example, that you rely too much on a trading bot, and sometimes the bot begins to malfunction when you have gotten so used to it. In that scenario, I believe you may not be able to trade by yourself since the bot is no longer working at that moment.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Regardless of the advance technology the artificial intelligence is running on there are limits to every thing and this case is just one of them.The Artificial intelligence is a programmed technology meaning it can’t develop more knowledge than the programmer placed in it. Same way I won’t trust anyone the promises a perfect trade following is strategies I would not trust any artificial intelligence convictions on trading, AI won’t make your trade successful the risk involved would still exists, the only good side is that it would trade without emotions.

comments.author: alastantiger
comments.body: Quote from: hack3rcon on May 06, 2023, 06:00:54 AMHello,Which one of these robots is better than the others?Please share your experiences.You are wrong if you ever think that AI can predict bitcoin price. In fact no professional will take you seriously if you say so. AI are machines programmed by humans to give out output based on some certain command and situations. Bitcoin market is not static is changes per second and new data is added per millisecond. So even if we assume that AI can do the prediction, it means some human agent must be present to training it with the new data which for now is not possible. I think for now we should focus on perfecting/ mastering our trading skills than looking for the easy way out.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: hack3rcon on May 06, 2023, 06:00:54 AMWhich one of these robots is better than the others?If i may ask that why do you choose to use a trading bot for yourself? are you a newbie in trading? Why am asking is that everything you're taking as a step has it own risk and it wouldn't do good for you spending much in seeing things going better but getting a wrong result worst than expected, trading bot can't perform everything for you to your best interest, they have limited capacity because they have been programmed, if you're a newbie i will advise you to learn first before starting at all, then read about the side effects of using a trading bot before using any.

comments.author: BlackBoss_
comments.body: Quote from: hack3rcon on May 06, 2023, 06:00:54 AMWhich one of these robots is better than the others?Trading bots are coded by different coder teams and their quality, security are different. Assume two trading bots are same in security and quality, its efficiency in bot operation will depend on two different users.Two users have different ways to set up their bots which are coded by a same team. This is where two traders with trading bots will diverge in profit or loss.Quote from: Doan9269 on May 06, 2023, 08:07:52 PMIf i may ask that why do you choose to use a trading bot for yourself? are you a newbie in trading?A newbie in trading will get loss in both manual trading and bot trading. If you don't have knowledge, don't know fundamentals, technical things, don't understand market psychology cycles, you will fail in either manual or bot trading.

comments.author: hack3rcon
comments.body: Quote from: Doan9269 on May 06, 2023, 08:07:52 PMQuote from: hack3rcon on May 06, 2023, 06:00:54 AMWhich one of these robots is better than the others?If i may ask that why do you choose to use a trading bot for yourself? are you a newbie in trading? Why am asking is that everything you're taking as a step has it own risk and it wouldn't do good for you spending much in seeing things going better but getting a wrong result worst than expected, trading bot can't perform everything for you to your best interest, they have limited capacity because they have been programmed, if you're a newbie i will advise you to learn first before starting at all, then read about the side effects of using a trading bot before using any. Hello,Thank you so much for your reply.I just want a bot to do the buying and selling for me. For example, sell Ethereum when became $10 more expensive than the current price and buy it when becomes $10 cheaper than the current price.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: hack3rcon on May 06, 2023, 06:00:54 AMHello,Which one of these robots is better than the others?https://www.unite.ai/best-ai-crypto-trading-bots/Please share your experiences.Thank you so much.I have used old bots that weren't that "AI". And from the looks of these they aren't that different. Calling them AI is just a trend when they actually are based on same algorithms as before.Most of these are going to belly up when market conditions are changing. Use your head. If there would be an infinite money making machine, it wouldn't be used by public as it would stop making money immediately.Trading is a zero sum game. If you think you can trust a trading bot doing the heavy lifting for you, you most likely are better off investing longer time frames and have an exit target that you commit to.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: None. All these bots will not be able to make you a lot of money and sooner or later you will lose all your deposit anyway. Now the topic of artificial intelligence is on the hype, so it is introduced in all possible crypto services, trading, prediction, altcoins. In fact, all this is just parasitizing on technology and trying to attract attention. All trading bots work only in case of their full authorship. All ready-made solutions that are offered to you are of no value. Buy bitcoin, save it for 5 years and in 5 years you are guaranteed to have more money earned than if you try to use these AI bots. Opinion, nothing more.

comments.author: ImThour
comments.body: None, never spend money on buying these AI Crypto Trading Bots. They do not work, they do not have high success rate and you will surely lose your money in the long run.And to be very honest, you can make more % of profit by just HODLing instead of trading it every day or week. Do not go with that path if you want to become rich with Bitcoin.Focus on collecting more and more satoshi, simple as that.

comments.author: nelson4lov
comments.body: Quote from: julekuyp on September 14, 2023, 07:01:59 PMI understand that choosing the right AI crypto trading bot can be a challenging task. There are several options available, and each has its own unique features and benefits.No AI bot can consistently make you money but you'll most likely experience consistent losses.Instead of asking for best AI trading bot, you should be asking thought-provoking questions like – If AI based trading bots are what they're advertised to be, why don't we have new millionaires?AI is fascinating and all but you'll get better value for the time you use to  research for the best AI trading tools if you just dedicate that time to learn trading properly.Shortcuts are often the long road.

comments.author: Ever-young
comments.body: Quote from: julekuyp on September 14, 2023, 07:01:59 PMI understand that choosing the right AI crypto trading bot can be a challenging task. There are several options available, and each has its own unique features and benefits.You can make provisions of those bot that you know about that are very interesting and have amazing features so that the OP might pick a few interest from any of them. In aspect of not being profiting, let’s not forget that those bots are also being programmed and i believe most of them make use or an already established data in other to make their predictions and market entry, they can’t be 100% accurate all the time just as a real time trader can’t be too sure of his/her trade always, their will always be those trade that won’t go on their Favour. The only different I see between using bot and normal real time prediction is that those bot will help in easy price prediction faster than a human will read a chart as that’s what they have been programmed to do.

comments.author: Salahmu
comments.body: Quote from: nelson4lov on September 15, 2023, 06:13:39 PMQuote from: julekuyp on September 14, 2023, 07:01:59 PMI understand that choosing the right AI crypto trading bot can be a challenging task. There are several options available, and each has its own unique features and benefits.No AI bot can consistently make you money but you'll most likely experience consistent losses.Instead of asking for best AI trading bot, you should be asking thought-provoking questions like – If AI based trading bots are what they're advertised to be, why don't we have new millionaires?AI is fascinating and all but you'll get better value for the time you use to  research for the best AI trading tools if you just dedicate that time to learn trading properly.Shortcuts are often the long road. Good observation, actually I'm not disputing the fact that most bots are not  reliable but as a beginner OP should focus more on the learning process if he wishes to go far on trading, preferably I would advise him to make some research online and also watch some videos to learn the fundamentals and technical analysis and more because even using both trading without a basic knowledge about trading could lead to account blown so if OP wishes to build a career on trading acquiring the skill will be the best instead of relying on bot to trade for him.
